title: Classical Piano Collection
description: A collection of 38 new versions of some of the greatest and most famous solo piano pieces plus one solo lute piece from the repertoire of classical music from the baroque, classical, romantic, and Impressionistic periods.
longDescription:
Preview: youtu.be/DUxvhHGKTjQ

A collection of 38 new versions of some of the greatest and most famous solo piano pieces plus one solo lute piece from the repertoire of classical music from the baroque, classical, romantic, and Impressionistic periods

1. Beethoven Presto (3:37)
2. Byrd Guitar Fantasia (1:35)
3. Calm Interlude (Mussorgsky) (0:47)
4. Chopin Mazurka (1:54)
5. Chopin Nocturne in B Minor (5:20)
6. Classical Waltz (2:39)
7. Dark Impressionism (Ravel) (1:39)
8. Debussy Children's Corner (2:20)
9. Debussy Golliwog's Cakewalk (2:32)
10. Debussy Minstrels(2:10)
11. Debussy The Little Shepherd (1:46)
12. Debussy The Snow is Dancing (2:23)
13. Emotional Romantic Piano(Mussorgsky) (1:43)
14. Grieg Ballade in G (0:45)
15. Grieg Elven Dance (0:56)
16. Grieg Watchman's Song(2:47)
17. Haydn Piano Adagio in Eb (2:22)
18. Haydn Piano Sonata in Eb (4:35)
19. Heavy Classical Piano (2:50)
20. Liszt Hungarian Rhapsody 10 (4:05)
22. Liszt La Campenella (4:54)
23. Liszt Love Dream (3:51)
24. Liszt Paganini Etude 2 (2:11)
25. Liszt Paganini Etude 4 (2:11)
26. Mozart Alla Turca (3:46)
26. Mussorgsky Flower Garden (1:05)
27. Mussorgsky Gnomes (2:23)
28. Mussorgsky The Market (1:52)
29. Mysterious Piano Mood (Mussorgsky) (1:52)
20. Pachelbel Canon (2:51)
31. Pictures at an Exhibition Theme (1:04)
32. Rachmaninov Etude Tableau (3:45)
33. Rachmaninov Moment Musicale 2 (2:47)
34. Ravel Minuet (2:23)
36. Scarlatti in C Major (2:23)
36. Scarlatti Sonata in E Minor (3:18)
37. Schuman Whims (4:28)
38. The Old Castle (2:46)
